title: Analyze Customer Feedback
description: A manager wants to understand common themes from recent customer satisfaction surveys.

tasks.expected_outcome: The manager accesses the feedback reporting tool.

tasks.description: Filter for all survey responses from the last month.
tasks.expected_outcome: The dashboard displays data for the selected time period.

tasks.description: Review the keyword analysis tool, which shows that 'long checkout lines' is a frequently mentioned negative term.
tasks.expected_outcome: The manager identifies a key area for operational improvement based on customer feedback.
